title: Finance Ministry releases ₹7,183 cr. revenue-deficit grant to 14 States - The Hindu
content: Finance Ministry releases ₹7,183 cr. revenue-deficit grant to 14 States  The Hindu
description: The commission had recommended a total Post Devolution Revenue Deficit Grant of ₹86,201 crore to 14 States for the financial year 2022-23, which will be released in 12 monthly instalments
